description:
Wendy is my mother in law who has lost over 80 pounds using the original Weight Watchers ® program.  She requested that I write a calculator to help her easily determine Point value on foods. Well.. here it is.

I also show the actual point value.  For example: If 1 serving is 2 points, but the actual point count is 1.7, then 2 servings will come to 3 points (3.4). Good information to know.

Features:

- Simple calculator to determine Weight Watchers ® points
- More features to come!

This application is not affiliated with Weight Watchers ®.
